languages.text: "Кроме того..." {n}Теодора чуть усмехается.{/n} "Даже сменив родовое имя, ты не избавишься от {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}заработанной ранее славы{/d}. Надеюсь, она поможет тебе прославить и династию фон Валанциус, к коей ты отныне принадлежишь".

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того..." {n}Теодора чуть усмехается.{/n} "Даже сменив родовое имя, ты не избавишься от {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}заработанной ранее славы{/d}. Надеюсь, она поможет тебе прославить и династию фон Валанциус, к коей ты отныне принадлежишь".

traits.locale_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the fame you previously garnered. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the fame you previously garnered. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the fame you previously garnered. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

"Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the fame you previously garnered. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

languages.text: “不仅如此……”{n}西奥多拉轻轻地笑了起来。{/n}“即便是改了姓，也无法掩盖{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}你曾经赢得的威望{/d}。我希望你曾经的光辉事迹，能激励着你，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来荣耀。”
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此……”{n}西奥多拉轻轻地笑了起来。{/n}“即便是改了姓，也无法掩盖你曾经赢得的威望。我希望你曾经的光辉事迹，能激励着你，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来荣耀。”

languages.text: «Además...». {n}Theodora ríe suavemente.{/n} «Ni siquiera cambiando de apellido perderás la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fama que ya habías alcanzado{/d}. Espero que te ayude a traer la gloria a la dinastía von Valancius, a la que ahora perteneces».
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

traits.locale_text: «Además...». {n}Theodora ríe suavemente.{/n} «Ni siquiera cambiando de apellido perderás la fama que ya habías alcanzado. Espero que te ayude a traer la gloria a la dinastía von Valancius, a la que ahora perteneces».

languages.text: 「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラはかすかに笑う。{/n}「家名を変えようとも、お前が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}これまでに獲得してきた名声{/d}がなくなることはない。その事実が、お前が今属しているフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光をもたらす助けとなることを願っている」
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

traits.locale_text: 「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラはかすかに笑う。{/n}「家名を変えようとも、お前がこれまでに獲得してきた名声がなくなることはない。それが、お前が今属しているフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝へと栄光をもたらす助けとなることを願っている」
「そのうえ…」{n}シオドーラはかすかに笑う。{/n}「家名を変えようとも、お前が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}これまでに獲得してきた名声{/d}がなくなることはない。その事実が、お前が今属しているフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光をもたらす助けとなることを願っている」

languages.text: « De plus, {n}ajoute Théodora avec un petit rire,{/n} votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}réputation{/d} vous suivra partout, même si vous deviez changer de nom. J'espère qu'elle vous aidera à couvrir de gloire la dynastie von Valancius, à laquelle vous appartenez désormais. »
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

traits.locale_text: « De plus, {n}ajoute Théodora avec un petit rire,{/n} votre réputation vous suivra partout, même si vous deviez changer de nom. J'espère qu'elle vous aidera à couvrir de gloire la dynastie von Valancius, à laquelle vous appartenez désormais. »

languages.text: "Zudem"{n}, Theodora lacht leicht auf,{/n} "könnt Ihr Euren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}bereits gesammelten Ruhm{/d} auch dann nicht abschütteln, wenn Ihr Euren Nachnamen ändert. Ich hoffe, er wird auch auf die Dynastie derer von Valancius abfärben, der Ihr nun angehört."
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem"{n}, Theodora lacht leicht auf,{/n} "könnt Ihr Euren bereits gesammelten Ruhm auch dann nicht abschütteln, wenn Ihr Euren Nachnamen ändert. Ich hoffe, er wird auch auf die Dynastie derer von Valancius abfärben, der Ihr nun angehört."

languages.text: "Dahası..." {n}Theodora hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Soyadını değiştirmen bile seni {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}öncesinde kazandığın şöhretten{/d} mahrum bırakmaz. Umarım bu şan, artık mensubu olduğun von Valancius hanedanlığını zaferlerle şereflendirmene yardımcı olur."
languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame you previously garnered{/d}. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."

traits.locale_text: "Dahası..." {n}Theodora hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Soyadını değiştirmen bile seni öncesinde kazandığın şöhretten mahrum bırakmaz. Umarım bu şan, artık mensubu olduğun von Valancius hanedanlığını zaferlerle şereflendirmene yardımcı olur."

languages.original_text: "Moreover..." {n}Theodora chuckles slightly.{/n} "Even changing your family name will not rid you of the fame you previously garnered. I hope it will also help you bring glory to the von Valancius dynasty, to which you now belong."
